newsitem.title: USA: Itla Capital Q1 shr $0.36 vs $0.37.
newsitem.headline: Itla Capital Q1 shr $0.36 vs $0.37.

text.p: ITLA Capital Corp Wednesday reported net income for the first quarter of 1997 of $2.9 million or $0.36 a share compared with net income of $2.2 million $0.37 a share for the first quarter of 1996.

Total assets and interest-earning assets as of March 31, 1997 were $810.5 million and $804.0 million, respectively, compared to $810.4 million and $801.2 million, respectively at Dec. 31, 1996. Nonperforming assets to total assets decreased to 1.5 percent at March 31, 1997 from 1.6 percent at Dec. 31, 1996 and from 1.9 percent from March 31, 1996.
